pr_title: [daikin] Support AUTO fan mode with Airbase

timeline.message:
[daikin] Support AUTO fan mode with Airbase

Signed-off-by: Jimmy Tanagra <jcode@tanagra.id.au>

timeline.bodyText: This class has a field called auto. Why isn't it set to true for this new enum value?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Are you referring to f_auto? f_auto applies to AUTO_LEVEL_N. When the Fan is set to "auto" (not auto_level_n), f_auto is set to false (0). That's just how the controller works.  It's not a mistake.
replies.author: jimtng
